body_html:
I think this might be a user-error. Please verify that idx_unsort has all values within bounds of the sizes of s and the sizes of o. The line I suspect is

o = o[idx_unsort]
s = s[idx_unsort]

I think it is doing an out-of-bounds indexing
body_text:
I think this might be a user-error. Please verify that idx_unsort has all values within bounds of the sizes of s and the sizes of o. The line I suspect is
o = o[idx_unsort]
s = s[idx_unsort]

I think it is doing an out-of-bounds indexing
body:
I think this might be a user-error. Please verify that `idx_unsort` has all values within bounds of the sizes of `s` and the sizes of `o`. The line I suspect is       

```
o = o[idx_unsort]
s = s[idx_unsort]
```
I think it is doing an out-of-bounds indexing
